fulltext:
T
TRAN HUU HIEN
H
FRONT-END DEVELOPER
EXPERIENCE
2017 - 2019
Front-end & mobile developer
mHealth Technologies JSC
-     Build a micro front-ends using Nuxt.js
-     Develop web apps for patient, admin and content editor 
using Vue.js and Vuetify.js
-     Develop wellness web app for company’s customers 
-     Develop a complete MVC website with Node.js
-     Develop mobile app using Flutter framework 
-     Build landing pages using Bootstrap CSS
-     Maintain and implement some features for a Wordress 
website
-     Design web & mobile UI with Adobe XD
-     Support two interns to develop some web apps with 
Vue.js
CONTACT
ADDRESS
Dong Hoa, Di An, Binh Duong
PHONE
+84 37 4639 299
EMAIL
hiens.dev@gmail.com
FACEBOOK
/huuhien.uit
EDUCATION
Engineer in Networking and Telecommunication
2014 - 2019
University of Information Technology, VNU-HCM
PROFILE
I’m passionate about design,
programming, and photography. 
I am also interested in economics 
and psychology.
My English is currently not so 
good, I will try to study hard 
English in the future.
I look forward to working in a 
modern, friendly and fair working 
environment.
My career objective is become a 
senior front-end / mobile 
developer in the next 2-3 years.
SKILLS & EXPERTISES
TECHNICAL
Vue.js & Nuxt.js
HTML5 & CSS3
Javascript
Flutter
Adobe PTS & XD
SOFT SKILLS
Creativity
Problem-solving
Adaptability
Teamwork
Individual work
CORE VALUES
INDEPENDENCE - BALANCE - 
RESPONSIBILITY - BOLDNESS 
- PASSION - HUMILITY - FUN  - 
SIMPLICITY - HONEST - TRUST 
HOBBY AND INTERESTS
Photography
Video game
Coffee
Walking
Painting
